languages.text: "Информация скудна. Его идентификационный код совпадает с моим, в его памяти хранятся данные, подтверждающие факт покушения. К несчастью, часть памяти повреждена импульсами, транслируемыми его боевой упряжью. Я готов утверждать, что он действительно был тем, кем назвался... и служил Деус Механикус с искренностью и рвением".

"The data is scarce. His identification code is the same as mine, and his memory contains data confirming that the assassination did take place. Unfortunately, some of his memory was damaged by pulses broadcast by his battle harness. I can assert with some confidence that he was who he claimed to be... and that he served the Deus Mechanicus earnestly and eagerly."
languages.original_text: "Информация скудна. Его идентификационный код совпадает с моим, в его памяти хранятся данные, подтверждающие факт покушения. К несчастью, часть памяти повреждена импульсами, транслируемыми его боевой упряжью. Я готов утверждать, что он действительно был тем, кем назвался... и служил Деус Механикус с искренностью и рвением".

Unfortunately, some of his memory was damaged by pulses broadcast by his battle harness. I can assert with some confidence that he was who he claimed to be... and that he served the Deus Mechanicus earnestly and eagerly."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “数据很匮乏。他的识别代码与我的相同，他记忆中包含的数据，足以证明那场刺杀确实发生过。但遗憾的是，他的一部分记忆被他的战斗装备发射出的脉冲破坏了。我可以很有把握地断言，他就是他声称的那个人……而且，他生前热切地侍奉着万机之神。”
languages.original_text: "The data is scarce. His identification code is the same as mine, and his memory contains data confirming that the assassination did take place. Unfortunately, some of his memory was damaged by pulses broadcast by his battle harness. I can assert with some confidence that he was who he claimed to be... and that he served the Deus Mechanicus earnestly and eagerly."

traits.locale_text: “数据很匮乏。他的识别代码与我的相同，他记忆中包含的数据，足以证明那场刺杀确实发生过。但遗憾的是，他的一部分记忆被他的战斗装备发射出的脉冲破坏了。我可以很有把握地断言，他就是他声称的那个人……而且，他生前热切地侍奉着万机之神。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Los datos son escasos. Su código de identificación es idéntico al mío y su memoria contiene datos que confirman que el asesinato tuvo lugar. Sin embargo, los pulsos emitidos por su arnés de combate han dañado parte de su memoria. Puedo afirmar con confianza que era quien decía ser... y que sirvió al Deus Mechanicus con sinceridad y entusiasmo».
languages.original_text: "The data is scarce. His identification code is the same as mine, and his memory contains data confirming that the assassination did take place. Unfortunately, some of his memory was damaged by pulses broadcast by his battle harness. I can assert with some confidence that he was who he claimed to be... and that he served the Deus Mechanicus earnestly and eagerly."

traits.locale_text: «Los datos son escasos. Su código de identificación es idéntico al mío y su memoria contiene datos que confirman que el asesinato tuvo lugar. Sin embargo, los pulsos emitidos por su arnés de combate han dañado parte de su memoria. Puedo afirmar con confianza que era quien decía ser... y que sirvió al Deus Mechanicus con sinceridad y entusiasmo».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「データは希少だ。彼の識別コードは私と同じで、彼の記憶には暗殺が行われたことを確認するデータが含まれている。残念なことに、彼の記憶の一部はバトルハーネスから発信されたパルスによって損傷していた。私は、彼が自らが名乗った者そのものであり、デウス・メカニカスのために真面目に熱心に働いていたと断言できる」
languages.original_text: "The data is scarce. His identification code is the same as mine, and his memory contains data confirming that the assassination did take place. Unfortunately, some of his memory was damaged by pulses broadcast by his battle harness. I can assert with some confidence that he was who he claimed to be... and that he served the Deus Mechanicus earnestly and eagerly."

traits.locale_text: 「データは希少だ。彼の識別コードは私と同じで、彼の記憶には暗殺が行われたことを確認するデータが含まれている。残念なことに、彼の記憶の一部はバトルハーネスから発信されたパルスによって損傷していた。私は、彼が自らが名乗った者そのものであり、デウス・メカニカスのために真面目に熱心に働いていたと断言できる」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Die Datenlage ist dürftig. Sein Identifikationscode ist derselbe wie meiner, und sein Speicher enthält Daten, die bestätigen, dass das Attentat stattgefunden hat. Unglücklicherweise wurde ein Teil seines Speichers durch Pulsstrahlen seines Kampfharnischs beschädigt. Ich kann mit einiger Überzeugung sagen, dass er der war, für den er sich ausgegeben hat ... und dass er dem Deus Mechanicus aufrichtig und eifrig gedient hat."
languages.original_text: "The data is scarce. His identification code is the same as mine, and his memory contains data confirming that the assassination did take place. Unfortunately, some of his memory was damaged by pulses broadcast by his battle harness. I can assert with some confidence that he was who he claimed to be... and that he served the Deus Mechanicus earnestly and eagerly."

traits.locale_text: "Die Datenlage ist dürftig. Sein Identifikationscode ist derselbe wie meine, und sein Speicher enthält Daten, die bestätigen, dass das Attentat stattgefunden hat. Unglücklicherweise wurde ein Teil seines Speichers durch Pulsstrahlen seines Kampfharnischs bestätigt. Ich mit einiger Überzeugung sagen, dass er der war, für den er sich ausgegeben hat ... Und dass er dem Deus Mechanicus aufrichtig und eifrig gedient hat."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Les données sont peu nombreuses. Son code d'identification est le même que le mien et sa mémoire contient des informations confirmant que l'assassinat a bien eu lieu. Malheureusement, les impulsions émises par son harnais de combat ont endommagé une partie de ses souvenirs. Je peux affirmer avec une certaine conviction qu'il était bien qui il prétendait être... et qu'il servait le Deus Mechanicus avec sincérité et enthousiasme. »
languages.original_text: "The data is scarce. His identification code is the same as mine, and his memory contains data confirming that the assassination did take place. Unfortunately, some of his memory was damaged by pulses broadcast by his battle harness. I can assert with some confidence that he was who he claimed to be... and that he served the Deus Mechanicus earnestly and eagerly."

traits.locale_text: « Les données sont peu nombreuses. Son code d'identification est le même que le mien et sa mémoire contient des informations confirmant que l'assassinat a bien eu lieu. Malheureusement, les impulsions émises par son harnais de combat ont endommagé une partie de ses souvenirs. Je peux affirmer avec une certaine conviction qu'il était bien qui il prétendait être... et qu'il servait le Deus Mechanicus avec sincérité et enthousiasme. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "The data is scarce. His identification code is the same as mine, and his memory contains data confirming that the assassination did take place. Unfortunately, some of his memory was damaged by pulses broadcast by his battle harness. I can assert with some confidence that he was who he claimed to be... and that he served the Deus Mechanicus earnestly and eagerly."

languages.text: "Veri miktarı çok az. Kimlik saptama kodu benimkiyle aynı. Belleğinde suikastın gerçekten de meydana geldiğini doğrulayan veriler bulunuyor. Ne yazık ki belleğinin bir bölümü, savaş teçhizatının yaydığı titreşimler yüzünden hasar görmüş. İddia ettiği kişi olduğuna ve Deus Mechanicus'a hem dürüstçe hem de hevesle hizmet ettiğini güvenle söyleyebilirim."
languages.original_text: "The data is scarce. His identification code is the same as mine, and his memory contains data confirming that the assassination did take place. Unfortunately, some of his memory was damaged by pulses broadcast by his battle harness. I can assert with some confidence that he was who he claimed to be... and that he served the Deus Mechanicus earnestly and eagerly."

traits.locale_text: "Veri miktarı çok az. Kimlik saptama kodu benimkiyle aynı ve belleğinde suikastın gerçekten de meydana geldiğini onaylayan veriler bulunuyor. Ne yazık ki belleğinin bir bölümü, savaş teçhizatı tarafından yayılan titreşimler nedeniyle hasar görmüş durumda. İddia ettiği kişi olduğuna ve Deus Mechanicus'a dürüstçe ve hevesle hizmet ettiğine dair fikrime önemli ölçüde güvenmekteyim."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
